articles.description: Almost all people previously infected with COVID-19 have high levels of antibodies for at least six months that are likely to protect them from reinfection with the disease, results of a major UK study showed on Wednesday.
articles.content: LONDON (Reuters) - Almost all people previously infected with COVID-19 have high levels of antibodies for at least six months that are likely to protect them from reinfection with the disease, result… [+1768 chars]

articles.author: Amy Furr
articles.title: WATCH: Mom Who Gave Birth in Coma and Beat Coronavirus Holds Newborn for First Time - Breitbart
articles.description: A mom in Poynette, Wisconsin, who gave birth while in a coma and recovered from the coronavirus finally got to meet her baby girl last week.
articles.content:
A mom in Poynette, Wisconsin, who gave birth while in a coma and recovered from the coronavirus finally got to meet her baby girl last week.

articles.content:
Although rate is reflected differently, spread remains at elevated levels
